name: Sushi Food Maker Cooking Kids Games (Girls & Boys)
name_original: Sushi Food Maker Cooking Kids Games (Girls & Boys)
description:
Can you make & decorate delicious food?

Play a fun new Kids Food Cooking game today for Free!

Sooo many Cooking Levels to play:
- Make your own Sushi rolls!
- How about serving up some delicious french fries!
- Make delightful sweet dessert suckers & cookies!

Enjoy playing an awesome kids cooking casual game today!!
